title: Library Management System
description: A library management system that handles operations such as book cataloging, borrowing, and returns.
stack: Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Spring Security, Thymeleaf, Maven, JUnit and Mockito, MySQL, Intellij

title: Reward Restauration
description:
Backend for a Restaurant Savings Plan Application (Microservices). The application consists of four microservices: 

- benefit-restaurant-service: Used to manage restaurants. 
- benefit-calculation-service: Used to calculate user benefits. 
- account-contribution-service: Used to manage user accounts. 
- reward-manager-service: Used to manage the distribution of benefits to the various beneficiaries for each account.
stack: Java, Spring Boot, Maven, Cloud Configuration, Eureka Naming, Load Balancing, Gateway, Git, Intellij, ThunderClient

title: Information Extraction from Scanned Receipts
description: Web application for extracting and displaying information from receipts
stack: React, Vite, TypeScript, Express, Bootstrap, AWS (Textract, DynamoDB), VsCode

title: Automated analysis tool for customs statistics
description: web application designed to automate and analyze customs statistics for BCEAO
stack: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data JPA, Maven, Swagger UI, Angular, Primeng, primeflex, MySQL, Docker, Keycloak, Gitlab, Intellij
